english.segment1: If you were a boat my darling a boat my darling Id be the wind at your back. If you were afraid my darling afraid my darling Id be the courage you lack.
english.segment2: If you were a bird then Id be a tree, and you would come home my darling to me. If you were asleep then Id be a dream, wherever you are thats where my heart will be.
english.segment3: oh do you know we belong together, oh do you know my heart is yours.
english.segment4: If you were the ocean then Id be the sand. If you were a song Id be the band. If you were the stars then Id be the moon. A light in the dark my darling for you.
english.segment5: oh do you know we belong together, oh do you know my heart is yours.
english.segment6: oh do you know we belong together, oh do you know my heart is yours. oh do you know we belong together, oh do you know my heart is yours.
